project_identity.name: 0x06-pointers_arrays_strings
project_identity.scope: Advanced exploration of pointers, arrays, and string manipulation in C, including implementation of standard library functions, encoding techniques, and complex buffer operations.
project_identity.description: Advanced exploration of pointers, arrays, and string manipulation in C, including implementation of standard library functions, encoding techniques, and complex buffer operations.

technical: Implement custom versions of standard C string functions
Perform advanced string manipulations with buffer constraints
Create encoding and transformation algorithms for strings
